about

When I rolled out of Philadelphia, people asked me to start a blog. I ended up making a cleaned up version of my site1

What I’m all about:

  • I’m a pretty big nerd.
  • I’m self employed through my consulting business2.
  • I work in IT.
  • I have an older sibling.
  • Kinesthetically challenged.
  • I read a lot.
  • I love puns.
  • I am not a great writter.
